intro.narration: Welcome, everyone! Today we're going to explore an exciting feature in WPForms. This powerful feature allows you to automatically send lead information from your forms directly to your Zoho account. Before we begin, make sure you have WPForms installed and activated on your site.
intro.subtitle: Learn how to integrate Zoho CRM with WPForms seamlessly.

steps.narration: First up, go to your WPForms settings and click on the Integrations tab. Once there, you'll see options to manage integrations like Constant Contact and Dropbox.
steps.subtitle: Access the Integrations tab in WPForms settings.

steps.narration: Next, click the '+ Add New Account' button to start integrating Zoho CRM with WPForms.
steps.subtitle: Add a new Zoho CRM account in WPForms.

steps.narration: Now, enter your email or mobile number and click 'Next' to sign in to your Zoho account.
steps.subtitle: Sign in to your Zoho account with email or mobile.

steps.narration: If you don't have a Zoho account yet, click 'Sign up now' to create one.
steps.subtitle: Create a new Zoho account if needed.

steps.narration: Then, click 'Accept' to allow WPForms to access your Zoho account data.
steps.subtitle: Authorize WPForms to access your Zoho data.

steps.narration: Once done, you'll see that Zoho CRM is successfully connected, indicated by the 'Connected' status.
steps.subtitle: Verify Zoho CRM connection status in WPForms.

steps.narration: Next, click 'Add New Connection' to set up a new Zoho CRM connection in WPForms.
steps.subtitle: Initiate a new Zoho CRM connection in WPForms.

steps.narration: Enter a nickname for the connection and click 'OK' to proceed.
steps.subtitle: Provide a nickname for your Zoho CRM connection.

steps.narration: Now, select an account from the 'Account' dropdown to configure your Zoho CRM connection.
steps.subtitle: Choose an account for configuring Zoho CRM.

steps.narration: Choose 'Create/Update Contact' from the 'Action to Perform' dropdown.
steps.subtitle: Select 'Create/Update Contact' action for Zoho CRM.

steps.narration: Fill in mandatory fields like Email, Name, and Contact Owner for the Zoho CRM integration.
steps.subtitle: Complete mandatory fields for Zoho CRM contact.

steps.narration: Click the tag icon to add a note in the Zoho CRM connection.
steps.subtitle: Add a note to your Zoho CRM connection.

steps.narration: Map custom fields by selecting corresponding Zoho CRM and form fields.
steps.subtitle: Map custom fields to Zoho CRM fields.

steps.narration: Select 'Create/Update Lead' from the 'Action to Perform' dropdown for Zoho CRM.
steps.subtitle: Choose 'Create/Update Lead' action for Zoho CRM.

steps.narration: Fill in lead details like Email, Lead Name, and Company for the Zoho CRM integration.
steps.subtitle: Complete lead details for Zoho CRM integration.

steps.narration: Click the tag icon to add a note in the Zoho CRM connection.
steps.subtitle: Add a note to your Zoho CRM lead connection.

steps.narration: Map custom fields by selecting corresponding Zoho CRM and form fields.
steps.subtitle: Map custom fields for Zoho CRM lead.

steps.narration: Select 'Delete Contact' from the 'Action to Perform' dropdown for Zoho CRM.
steps.subtitle: Choose 'Delete Contact' action in Zoho CRM.

steps.narration: Finally, select the email field to identify which contact to delete in Zoho CRM.
steps.subtitle: Select email field to delete contact in Zoho CRM.
